attributes.action: say no to the proposed annual licence fee for smokers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government seems to be considering charging all smokers £10 a year to apply for a licence to buy ciggarettes.

Forcing people to apply for licences to smoke will not stop people smoking, it will just annoy and infuriate them.

What information would we be expected to fill out to apply for one on these so called "complicated forms"?
Many of us would surely just get our friends with licences to buy them for us.

It does not seem like a legitimate plan to make people quit, more like a shameful new way to just force more money out of people, and persecute smokers. There will never be licences to buy alcohol or unhealthy foods, so why should there be one for smoking?

The smoking ban encourages people to quit, if you are willing to stand out in the traditional English weather, a form will not stop you. Focus on stopping another unhealthy habit for once.
